Thanks Jon!!

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Jon 
  To: EVP-ITC@ya=
hoogroups.com 
  Sent: Wednesday, April 08, 2009 7:49 AM
  Subject: Re: [EV=
P-ITC] Some more from last month.



  Hi April,

  The lastest version of =
EVP maker allows you to capture EVP's directly to your laptop through a mic=
rophone attached to the Mic input on your laptop. I got mine from http://ww=
w.giveawayoftheday.com.  They give away a different software everyday.  The=
y have a section for freeware that you can pickup any time.

  Regards,
  J=
on in Texas






---------------------------------------------------------=
---------------------
  From: April Abercrombie <april@abercrombieghostrese=
arch.com>
  To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
  Sent: Wednesday, April 8, 2009 8:=
35:32 AM
  Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Some more from last month.



  Wow! Thos=
e are pretty clear! And I have to say that I approve of the color. Purple i=
s my favorite LOL!!!

  You know, I used to have on my computer little prog=
ram that I downloaded called "EVP Maker". I wonder if that is the same EVP =
maker you mentioned on this site. Unfortunately I lost it when I had to ref=
ormat my machine, and could not find the link to the original download. I b=
elieve I found the original link from the "Shadowlands" website, if I remem=
ber correctly.

  Besides that, this was YEARS ago, and I really did not un=
derstand how to use it, or even what it was for.

    ----- Original Messag=
e ----- 
    From: Frank Sumption 
    To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com 
    Se=
nt: Tuesday, April 07, 2009 9:12 PM
    Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Some more fr=
om last month.


    Yeah, see http://purplealieng irl.tripod. com/ 


    =
On Tue, Apr 7, 2009 at 9:01 PM, April Abercrombie <april@abercrombiegh ostr=
esearch. com> wrote:


      Realy?? Sweet!

        ----- Original Message=
 ----- 
        From: Frank Sumption 
        To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com =

        Sent: Tuesday, April 07, 2009 8:55 PM
        Subject: Re: [EVP-IT=
C] Some more from last month.


        Well, one anyway. ;-]


        On =
Tue, Apr 7, 2009 at 8:42 PM, April Abercrombie <april@abercrombiegh ostrese=
arch. com> wrote:


          Do you?

            ----- Original Message -=
---- 
            From: Frank Sumption 
            To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups=
 .com 
            Sent: Tuesday, April 07, 2009 8:28 PM
            Subjec=
t: Re: [EVP-ITC] Some more from last month.


            This one isn't as=
 clear, at 2 seconds "got aliens in that house"


            On Tue, Apr 7=
, 2009 at 8:20 PM, Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@ gmail.com> wrote:

    =
           That's probably cuz I send most of these as e-mail attachments, =
and they don't go to group, yahoo stips off any attachments.

             =
  F-S


              On Tue, Apr 7, 2009 at 4:02 PM, threadsintyme@ juno.c=
om <Threadsintyme@ juno.com> wrote:


                Kristin,
            =
    I have the same problem also. When I click on the link a window pops up=
 saying thast the URL is not correct...or has been moved.
                A=
l 


                ---------- Original Message ----------
               =
 From: "Kristin Morris" <ckmorris95@sbcgloba l.net>
                To: <EV=
P-ITC@yahoogroups .com>

                Subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] Some more f=
rom last month.
                Date: Tue, 7 Apr 2009 16:14:18 -0500




  =
              Frank.  My computer just won=E2=80=99t open these clips.  Ver=
y frustrating for me.  I know it=E2=80=99s a pain in the arse to load them =
in the files section instead of just adding as an attachment but maybe that=
 might help?  Then again if it is just me with the problem then no worries.=
  I love computers and hate them at the same time!!  
                k


-=
---------------------------------------------------------------

          =
      From: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com [mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com] On B=
ehalf Of Frank Sumption
                Sent: Tuesday, April 07, 2009 9:45 =
AM 

                To: grassharp@yahoogrou ps.com; evp-itc@yahoogroups .c=
om

                Subject: [EVP-ITC] Some more from last month.









=
                 I rarely know if anyone hears this stuff, as few comment. =
The one about sausage is kinda iffy."Princess, I never Liked that box..." i=
s the same on as "Princess I love that box...", I just hear it different th=
is morning. That's the only one I hear different from last night. I include=
d the forward, and reverse components. 

                 These are from th=
e test I did to see if I could use a pre-recorded RAW audio tape in areas w=
herer there's no radio stations, sincve many insist on going to "haunted lo=
cations" that have few, if any radio stations to use for the raw audio. #48=
 has an aux input so other raw audio can be used.

                 Frank-S=











                ____________ _________ _________ _________ _____=
____ _________ ___ 
                Research online bachelor degrees from l=
eading universities today.
